titleStmt.title: The nativity of Mr. Will. Lilly astrologically performed shewing how he hath lived, and what death he may probably die. For the satisfaction of astrologers and others. Published to the world by James Blackwel, student in astrology and physick.
titleStmt.author: Blackwel, James.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho. Johnson, at the White Cock in Rood-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
